languages.text: "Такое — никогда! Было... по-другому. Не так сильно и не так страшно. Появлялись фантомы. Ломались механизмы. Члены экипажа сходили с ума..." {n}Идира осекается.{/n} "Но леди фон Валанциус об этом знала. Она сама говорила, что это малая цена, допустимый расход! Ни один {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}псайкер{/g} не застрахован от подобного! А то, что случилось сейчас... это просто ошибка. Я ее не повторю!" {n}Идира растягивает губы в беспомощной улыбке, глядя мимо вас.{/n} "Больше никаких ошибок, Лорд-капитан".

traits.locale_text: "Такое — никогда! Было... по другому. Не так сильно и не так страшно. Появлялись фантомы. Ломались механизмы. Члены экипажа сходили с ума..." {n}Идира осекается.{/n} "Но леди фон Валанциус об этом знала. Она сама говорила, что это малая цена, допустимый расход! Ни один псайкер не застрахован от подобного! А то, что случилось сейчас... это просто ошибка. Я ее не повторю!" {n}Идира растягивает губы в беспомощной улыбке, глядя мимо вас.{/n} "Больше никаких ошибок, Лорд-капитан".
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Like this — never! Well, there was something... but it was different. It wasn't as strong, or as terrifying. Apparitions appeared. Mechanisms malfunctioned. The crew lost their minds..." {n}Idira breaks off.{/n} "But Lady von Valancius knew about that. She said it was a small price to pay, an acceptable expense! No {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} is immune to it! But what happened here... it was just a mistake. I won't do it again!" {n}Idira stretches her lips in a helpless smile, looking past you.{/n} "There will be no more mistakes, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: "Такое — никогда! Было... по-другому. Не так сильно и не так страшно. Появлялись фантомы. Ломались механизмы. Члены экипажа сходили с ума..." {n}Идира осекается.{/n} "Но леди фон Валанциус об этом знала. Она сама говорила, что это малая цена, допустимый расход! Ни один {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}псайкер{/g} не застрахован от подобного! А то, что случилось сейчас... это просто ошибка. Я ее не повторю!" {n}Идира растягивает губы в беспомощной улыбке, глядя мимо вас.{/n} "Больше никаких ошибок, Лорд-капитан".

The crew lost their minds..." {n}Indira breaks off.{/n} "But Lady von Valancius knew about that. She said it was a small price to pay, an acceptable expense! No psyker is immune to it! But what happened here... it was just a mistake. I won't do it again!" {n}Indira stretches her lips in a helpless smile, looking past you.{/n} "There will be no more mistakes, Lord Captain."

I won't do it again!" {n}Idira stretches her lips in a helpless smile, looking past you.{/n} "There will be no more mistakes, Lord Captain."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “像这样的事情从来没发生过！不过，之前确实发生过某些事情……不过并不一样。之前的爆发没有这么强大，也没有这么可怕。当时出现了幽灵，机械装置发生了故障，船员也发了疯……”{n}伊迪拉停下来了。{/n}“但冯·瓦兰修斯夫人知道这件事情。她说，这只是个小小的代价，这种代价可以承受！没有哪个{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}灵能者{/g}可以永远不遇到这种事情！但这次发生的事情……这一切都是个错误！我再也不会做这种事情了！”{n}伊迪拉抿着嘴唇，露出了无助的笑容，目光越过了你。{/n}“这种错误再也不会发生了，舰长大人。”
languages.original_text: "Like this — never! Well, there was something... but it was different. It wasn't as strong, or as terrifying. Apparitions appeared. Mechanisms malfunctioned. The crew lost their minds..." {n}Idira breaks off.{/n} "But Lady von Valancius knew about that. She said it was a small price to pay, an acceptable expense! No {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} is immune to it! But what happened here... it was just a mistake. I won't do it again!" {n}Idira stretches her lips in a helpless smile, looking past you.{/n} "There will be no more mistakes, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: “像这样的事情从来没发生过！不过，之前确实发生过某些事情……不过并不一样。之前的爆发没有这么强大，也没有这么可怕。当时出现了幽灵，机械装置发生了故障，船员也发了疯……”{n}伊迪拉停下来了。{/n}“但冯·瓦兰修斯夫人知道这件事情。她说，这只是个小小的代价，这种代价可以承受！没有哪个{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}灵能者{/g}可以永远不遇到这种事情！但这次发生的事情……这一切都是个错误！我再也不会做这种事情了！”{n}伊迪拉抿着嘴唇，露出了无助的笑容，目光越过了你。{/n}“这种错误再也不会发生了，舰长大人。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «¡Así nunca! Bueno, hubo algo... pero era distinto. No era tan fuerte ni tan aterrador. Hubo apariciones. Algunos mecanismos fallaron. Los tripulantes perdieron la cordura...». {n}Idira se interrumpe.{/n} «Pero lady von Valancius lo sabía. Dijo que era un pequeño precio a pagar, ¡un coste aceptable! ¡Ningún {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psíquico{/g} puede evitarlo! Pero lo que ha ocurrido aquí... ha sido un error. ¡No lo repetiré!». {n}Idira fuerza una sonrisa desamparada, mirando a un punto a tu espalda.{/n} «No habrá más errores, Lord Capitán».
languages.original_text: "Like this — never! Well, there was something... but it was different. It wasn't as strong, or as terrifying. Apparitions appeared. Mechanisms malfunctioned. The crew lost their minds..." {n}Idira breaks off.{/n} "But Lady von Valancius knew about that. She said it was a small price to pay, an acceptable expense! No {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} is immune to it! But what happened here... it was just a mistake. I won't do it again!" {n}Idira stretches her lips in a helpless smile, looking past you.{/n} "There will be no more mistakes, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: «¡Así nunca! Bueno, hubo algo... pero era distinto. No era tan fuerte ni tan aterrador. Hubo apariciones. Algunos mecanismos fallaron. Los tripulantes perdieron la cordura...». {n}Idira se interrumpe.{/n} «Pero lady von Valancius lo sabía. Dijo que era un pequeño precio a pagar, ¡un coste aceptable! ¡Ningún {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psíquico{/g} puede evitarlo! Pero lo que ha ocurrido aquí... ha sido un error. ¡No lo repetiré!». {n}Idira fuerza una sonrisa desamparada, mirando a un punto a tu espalda.{/n} «No habrá más errores, Lord Capitán».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「こんなこと…これまでなかったわ！ううん、近いことはあったかもしれないけれど…でも、違うの。それは、そんなに強くもなくて、恐ろしくもなかったわ。幻影が現れた。機械が故障した。クルーは正気を失って…」{n}イディラは言葉を切る。{/n}「でもレディ・フォン・ヴァランシウスはそのことを知っていたわ。あの人は、それは小さな代償であり、許容できる出費だって言ってたの！どんな{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}異能者{/g}もそれに抗うことはできないって！だけどここで起きたことは...ただの過ちだったの。もう二度と起こさせない！」{n}イディラは力なく唇を引き伸ばし、あなたへと微笑みかける。{/n}「もう過ちは犯さないわ、ロード・キャプテン」
languages.original_text: "Like this — never! Well, there was something... but it was different. It wasn't as strong, or as terrifying. Apparitions appeared. Mechanisms malfunctioned. The crew lost their minds..." {n}Idira breaks off.{/n} "But Lady von Valancius knew about that. She said it was a small price to pay, an acceptable expense! No {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} is immune to it! But what happened here... it was just a mistake. I won't do it again!" {n}Idira stretches her lips in a helpless smile, looking past you.{/n} "There will be no more mistakes, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: 「こんなこと…これまでなかったわ！ううん、近いことはあったかもしれないけれど…でも、違うの。それは、そんなに強くもなくて、恐ろしくもなかったわ。幻影が現れた。機械が故障した。クルーは正気を失って…」{n}イディラは言葉を切る。{/n}「でもレディ・フォン・ヴァランシウスはそのことを知っていたわ。あの人は、それは小さな代償であり、許容できる出費だって言ってたの！どんな{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}異能者{/g}もそれに抗うことはできないって！だけどここで起きたことは...ただの過ちだったの。もう二度と起こさせない！」{n}イディラは力なく唇を引き伸ばし、あなたへと微笑みかける。{/n}「もう過ちは犯さないわ、ロード・キャプテン」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "In dieser Form ... noch nie! Gut, da war etwas ... aber das war anders. Es war nicht so stark, nicht so erschreckend. Da waren Erscheinungen. Mechanische Fehlfunktionen. Die Crew verlor ihren Verstand ..." {n}Idira hält inne.{/n} "Aber Lady von Valancius wusste davon. Sie sagte, das wäre ein geringer Preis, eine akzeptable Aufwendung! Kein {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}Psioniker{/g} ist dagegen immun! Aber was hier passiert ist ... das war nur ein Fehler. Und ich werde ihn nicht wiederholen." {n}Idira verzieht ihre Lippen zu einem hilflosen Lächeln und erklärt mit leerem Blick:{/n} "Es wird keine Fehler mehr geben, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: "Like this — never! Well, there was something... but it was different. It wasn't as strong, or as terrifying. Apparitions appeared. Mechanisms malfunctioned. The crew lost their minds..." {n}Idira breaks off.{/n} "But Lady von Valancius knew about that. She said it was a small price to pay, an acceptable expense! No {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} is immune to it! But what happened here... it was just a mistake. I won't do it again!" {n}Idira stretches her lips in a helpless smile, looking past you.{/n} "There will be no more mistakes, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: "In dieser Form ... noch nie! Gut, da war etwas ... aber das war anders. Es war nicht so stark, nicht so erschreckend. Da waren Erscheinungen. Mechanische Fehlfunktionen. Die Crew verlor ihren Verstand ..." {n}Idira hält inne.{/n} "Aber Lady von Valancius wusste davon. Sie sagte, das wäre ein geringer Preis, eine akzeptable Aufwendung! Kein {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}Psioniker{/g} ist dagegen immun! Aber was hier passiert ist ... das war nur ein Fehler. Und ich werde ihn nicht wiederholen." {n}Idira verzieht ihre Lippen zu einem hilflosen Lächeln und erklärt mit leerem Blick:{/n} "Es wird keine Fehler mehr geben, Lord Captain."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Jamais encore de cette manière ! Il y a bien eu quelques signes avant-coureurs, mais... c'était différent. Ce n'était pas aussi puissant ni aussi terrifiant. Des apparitions se sont manifestées, des mécanismes sont tombés en panne, l'équipage a perdu la tête... » {n}Idira s'interrompt.{/n} « Mais dame von Valancius était au courant, et elle disait que c'était un faible prix à payer, que le risque était acceptable. Aucun {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} n'est immunisé contre ce phénomène ! Ce qui vient de se passer ici n'était qu'une regrettable erreur. Ça ne se reproduira plus, c'est promis ! » {n}Idira esquisse un sourire contrit tout en prenant soin d'éviter votre regard.{/n} « Je ne commettrai plus d'erreur, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »
languages.original_text: "Like this — never! Well, there was something... but it was different. It wasn't as strong, or as terrifying. Apparitions appeared. Mechanisms malfunctioned. The crew lost their minds..." {n}Idira breaks off.{/n} "But Lady von Valancius knew about that. She said it was a small price to pay, an acceptable expense! No {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} is immune to it! But what happened here... it was just a mistake. I won't do it again!" {n}Idira stretches her lips in a helpless smile, looking past you.{/n} "There will be no more mistakes, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: « Jamais encore de cette manière ! Il y a bien eu quelques signes avant-coureurs, mais... c'était différent. Ce n'était pas aussi puissant ni aussi terrifiant. Des apparitions se sont manifestées, des mécanismes sont tombés en panne, l'équipage a perdu la tête... » {n}Idira s'interrompt.{/n} « Mais dame von Valancius était au courant, et elle disait que c'était un faible prix à payer, que le risque était acceptable. Aucun {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} n'est immunisé contre ce phénomène ! Ce qui vient de se passer ici n'était qu'une regrettable erreur. Ça ne se reproduira plus, c'est promis ! » {n}Idira esquisse un sourire contrit tout en prenant soin d'éviter votre regard.{/n} « Je ne commettrai plus d'erreur, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Bunun gibisini hiç yaşamadım. Aslında bir şey daha olmuştu ama o farklıydı. Bunun kadar güçlü ve korkunç değildi. Hayaletler gördüm. Mekanizmalar bozuldu. Mürettebat aklını yitirdi..." {n}İdira susuyor.{/n} "Fakat Leydi von Valancius, tüm bunlardan haberdardı. Ödenebilecek küçük bir bedel, kabul edilebilir bir külfet olduğunu söyledi. Hiçbir {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}ruhsezerin{/g} buna bağışıklığı yoktur! Burada olanlarsa... Hata işte, oldu. Bir daha olmayacak!" {n}Çaresiz gülümsemesi sonucu dudakları gerilen İdira, gözlerini kaçırıyor.{/n} "Başka hata olmayacak Lord Kaptan."
languages.original_text: "Like this — never! Well, there was something... but it was different. It wasn't as strong, or as terrifying. Apparitions appeared. Mechanisms malfunctioned. The crew lost their minds..." {n}Idira breaks off.{/n} "But Lady von Valancius knew about that. She said it was a small price to pay, an acceptable expense! No {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} is immune to it! But what happened here... it was just a mistake. I won't do it again!" {n}Idira stretches her lips in a helpless smile, looking past you.{/n} "There will be no more mistakes, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: "Bunun gibisini hiç yaşamadım. Aslında bir şey daha olmuştu ama o farklıydı. Bunun kadar güçlü ve korkunç değildi. Hayaletler gördüm. Mekanizmalar bozuldu. Mürettebat aklını yitirdi..." {n}İdira susuyor.{/n} "Fakat Leydi von Valancius tüm bunlardan haberdardı. Ödenebilecek küçük bir bedel olduğunu, kabul edilebilir bir külfet olduğunu söyledi. Hiçbir {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}ruhsezer{/g}in buna bağışıklığı yok! Burada yaşananlar... Sadece bir hataydı. Bir daha olmayacak!" {n}İdira gözlerini kaçırıyor ve çaresiz bir gülümsemeyle dudakları geriliyor.{/n} "Başka hata olmayacak Lord Kaptan."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
